import { Switch } from '@mui/material' import React, { useState } from 'react' import { validate1 } from './Validate1' import "../form/Insert.css" import axios from 'axios' const Login = () => { const [togglee,settoggle] = useState(false); const toggle =()=>{ togglee ? settoggle(false):settoggle(true) } const url="http://192.168.1.40:8070/stud/view" const [data,setdata] = useState({ FullName: "", fatherName: "", motherName: "", F_occupation: "", M_occupation: "", email: "", phone: "", address: "", city: "", gender: "", }) function insert(e){ e.preventDefault(); axios.post(url,{ FullName: data.FullName, fatherName:data.fatherName, motherName:data.motherName, F_occupation:data.F_occupation, M_occupation:data.M_occupation, email:data.email, phone:data.phone, address:data.address, city:data.city, gender:data.gender }) .then(res=>{ console.log(res.data) }) } function handel(e){ const newdata={...data} newdata[e.target.id] = e.target.value setdata(newdata) console.log(newdata) } return ( <>
insert(e)}> handel(e)}> handel(e)}> handel(e)}> handel(e)}> handel(e)}> handel(e)}> handel(e)}> {/* {/ /} {/ /} */} handel(e)}> {/* */}
) } export default Login
